A two-fold attack whereby Kurenai first ensnares the opponent in a genjutsu, binding them with trees and then Asuma, using his [[Chakra Blades]] finishes them with his Flying Swallow.

[[es:Genjutsu: Muerte de Prisión Arbórea de Golondrinas Voladoras]]
[[pl:Genjutsu: Wiążące Drzewo Latającej Jaskółki]]
